00028 #pragma once
00029 
00030 #include <l4/sys/types.h>
00031 #include <l4/sys/l4int.h>
00032 #include <l4/sys/capability>
00033 #include <l4/re/protocols>
00034 
00035 namespace L4Re
00036 {
00037 
00038   // MISSING:
00039   // * size support in map, mapped size in reply
00040   // * looping map function to map in a whole data space
00041 
00067 class L4_EXPORT Dataspace :
00068   public L4::Kobject_t<Dataspace, L4::Kobject, L4Re::Protocol::Dataspace>
00069 {
00070   L4_KOBJECT(Dataspace)
00071 
00072 public:
00073 
00077   enum Map_flags
00078   {
00082     Map_ro = 0,
00086     Map_rw = 1,
00087   };
00088 
00093   struct Stats {
00094     unsigned long size;   
00095     unsigned long flags;  
00096   };
00097 
00098 
00113   long map(l4_addr_t offset, unsigned long flags, l4_addr_t local_addr,
00114            l4_addr_t min_addr, l4_addr_t max_addr) const throw();
00115 
00129   long map_region(l4_addr_t offset, unsigned long flags,
00130                   l4_addr_t min_addr, l4_addr_t max_addr) const throw();
00131 
00144   long clear(l4_addr_t offset, unsigned long size) const throw();
00145 
00154   long allocate(l4_addr_t offset, l4_size_t size) throw();
00155 
00173   long copy_in(l4_addr_t dst_offs, L4::Cap<Dataspace> src,
00174                l4_addr_t src_offs, unsigned long size) const throw();
00175 
00191   long phys(l4_addr_t offset, l4_addr_t &phys_addr, l4_size_t &phys_size) const throw();
00192 
00199   long size() const throw();
00200 
00209   long flags() const throw();
00210 
00217    int info(Stats *stats) const throw();
00218 
00225   long take() const throw();
00226 
00233   long release() const throw();
00234 
00235 private:
00236   long __map(l4_addr_t offset, unsigned char *size, unsigned long flags,
00237              l4_addr_t local_addr) const throw();
00238 
00239 };
00240 
00241 
00242 }
